title: [New Zealand Weekly Review. No. 202]
brief_description: Newsreel items: 1. Highbank - largest power unit in New Zealand in operation. Also provides water for irrigation and power in the Canterbury basin. 2. Christchurch - woollen manufacture. School children learn by ancient methods the art of spinning wool. 3. Italy - donkey derby. 26th Batallion New Zealand Division hold spring meeting. 4. Rehabilitation - the man on the land. Ex-servicemen attend training farm to help establish themselves back into civvy life. 5. Wellington lunch hour concert.
